gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਰੋਗੇ || ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਭੋਗੇ ||
transliteration: Namo Sarab Roge|| Namo Sarab Bhoge||
translation: Salutation to Thee O Universal Ailment Lord ! Salutation to Thee O Universal Enjoyer Lord !

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਜੀਤੰ || ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਭੀਤੰ ||੬੯||
transliteration: Namo Sarab Jeetan|| Namo Sarab Bhootan||69||
translation: Salutation to Thee O Universal Ailment Lord! Salutation to Thee O Universal Fear Lord! 69.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਗÎਾਨੰ || ਨਮੋ, ਪਰਮ ਤਾਨੰ ||
transliteration: Namo Sarab Giaanan|| Namo Param Taanan||
translation: Salutation to Thee O Omniscient Lord! Salutation to Thee O Omnipotent Lord!

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਮੰਤ੍ਰੰ || ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਜੰਤ੍ਰੰ ||੭੦||
transliteration: Namo Sarab Mantran|| Namo Sarab Jantran||70||
translation: Salutation to Thee O Entire-Mantras-Knower Lord! Salutation to Thee O Entire-Yantras Knower Lord! 70.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਦਿ੍ਰੱਸੰ || ਨਮੋ, ਸਰਬ ਕਿ੍ਰੱਸੰ ||
transliteration: Namo Sarab Drissan|| Namo Sarab Krissan||
translation: Salutation to Thee O All-Beholder Lord! Salutation to Thee O Universal attraction Lord!
Salutation to Thee O All-Colour Lord! Salutation to Thee O Three-World-Destroyer Lord! 71.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ, ਜੀਵ ਜੀਵੰ || ਨਮੋ, ਬੀਜ ਬੀਜੇ ||
transliteration: Namo Jeev  Jeev an|| Namo Booj Booje||
translation: Salutation to Thee O Universal-Life Lord! Salutation to Thee O Primal-Seed Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Harmless Lord! Salutation to Thee O Non-Appeaser Lord! Salutation to Thee O Universal Boon-Bestwer Lord! 72.
Salutation to Thee O Generosity-Embodiment Lord! Salutation to Thee O Sins-Destroyer Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Ever-Universal Riches Denizen Lord! Salutation to Thee O Ever-Universal Powers Denizen Lord! 73.
Thy actions are Permanent. Thy Laws are Permanent.
Thou art united with all, Thou art their permanent Enjoyer.74.
Thy Kingdom is Permanent, Thy Adornment is Permanent.
